definitions.definition: Someone who guards a premises at night .
A batsman who is sent in to bat higher than his usual position near the end of a day's play (when light is poor), in order to protect better batsmen.

main_definition: Someone who guards a premises at night .
secondary_definitions: ( cricket ) A batsman who is sent in to bat higher than his usual position near the end of a day's play (when light is poor), in order to protect better batsmen.
